message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. After considering our conversation, I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of this product,  $950,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it.  This price would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $900,000. This is the best price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to you and the market.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $900,000 is still a bit higher than I can go.  Would you be willing to accept $875,000? This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product for both of us.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $885,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into it.
